website_summaries.verdict: Double reinforced seams and thick, water-resistant materials keep your furniture safe in any weather.
pros: Available in a wide range of sizes
Fabric is durable and water resistant
Seams are lined with protective tape to provide further water protection
Covers can be left outdoors without fear of mold or mildew
Clips and ties keep cover securely attached
cons: Brown color fades after long-term sun exposure

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size; Easy to Put ON & Take OFF - Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Duck Covers 'Ultimate' Covers to protect my new Better Homes and Garden Patio furniture (Hawthorne Park 4pc Sofa Conversation Set). The covers fit the furniture extremely well, and should protect the chairs and sofa from our strong Florida sun, rainy summers and the nasty pollen we get in the early spring. The covers are very easy to put on and remove. The sofa bench is perfect for storing the covers while we use the furniture. For reference, here are the dimensions for my furniture in the event you have similar sized furniture. 3-Person Sofa: 35.21in.D x 80in.W x 32in.H Chair: 5.21in.D x 32in.W x 32in.H I hope you found the review helpful in making your purchase decision.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota2k4

customer_reviews.title: Quality of materials is excellent, as it tailoring and fit is spot on
customer_reviews.text: This is a much nicer product than I anticipated, quite frankly it should be priced much higher. For under $ 40 a cover, I had low expectations (and I am in the furniture industry myself). Figured if it was junk, I'd send it back. Quality of materials is excellent, as it tailoring and fit is spot on. I actually bought two of these for a sectional unit - my wife was impressed with them as well. You really cannot go wrong with the product just makes sure it works for the specs on the piece you want to cover.
customer_reviews.author: Duane R. Collie

customer_reviews.title: The covers were faulty - there was some sort of ...
customer_reviews.text: The covers were faulty - there was some sort of coating on the inside that bled onto our furniture and stained the cushions and the frames pink. Duck Covers will not cover any damage to your furniture - buyer beware. We will need to replace the furniture and are out over $2,000. We will never buy Duck Covers again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work!!!
customer_reviews.text: They were put to the test immediately. Got the sofa and two chair covers, put them on without the cushions. Rained pretty hard no water on the furniture. So bit the bullet and put the cushions on, then covers. Then it rained for 4 days straight. Cushions are dry, and I checked them every time it stopped raining enough to get out without drowning. This is so nice cause it is a pain to find storage for all those huge cushions!
customer_reviews.author: J. Watts

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for one week and it has rained nearly every day and the furniture with cushions underneath are perfectly dry. The material is heavy duty and the water just beads up and rolls off. The color is true to the picture and looks really good. I do think it will fade in time but I'm not terribly concerned with that......my primary concern was to keep the furniture dry. Everything will fade eventually from the sun. The size also was as indicated. I have a three cushion sofa which it covers properly and I also lay the chase lounge cushion on the sofa before covering it up at night so it does double duty......the sofa and the chase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Snelbakers

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this particular cover because it clearly stated that it's waterproof. I have another one that came with a different patio sofa I had purchased... THAT one is waterproof! After a rain, this cover has water on the reverse side of the cover and the cushions underneath are wet...not soaking wet by any means, but very damp. Would probably be WET except that they are weather/water resistant. Annoying. I do not recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: jczecher

customer_reviews.title: Durable, attractive cover that lives up to the ads
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, strong patio furniture cover. Size was spot on. Bought this after the pillows on my new furniture got soaked twice, once by rain, once by dew. First test of the quality was high winds. The cover was flapping around a bit, and when I checked on it, I noticed the straps were not secured. Put them in place and the cover stopped moving in the wind. 2nd test - moderate downpour. I did not get the air pillows, so was worried about sitting water soaking through. Went outside and shook the cover a little. The rain that had collected on it literally went flying! Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price, well designed
customer_reviews.text: Fits our loveseat perfectly (71 in. W x 36 in. D x 29 in. H), our first cover didn't touch the ground and this one does. Very heavy duty and seems to be great quality. Our patio furniture is under a gazebo so we're not super concerned about the cover being fully waterproof, but it is excellent for keeping the light grey fabric clean since we've found stray cats sleep (and sometimes spray) on the set. No more fur and muddy pawprints!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: WOW buy it now! best product!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great cover. I have used 2 other brands and they came looking cheap and like junk and they only lasted 1 winter. I got these and the quality is off the charts! And as a bonus theyre so nice looking you can just used them as outdoor couch covers LOL. The fabric look style and best of all 2 massive rain storms and they worked perfect. Lastly the price on these is lower than the other covers I ordered and these are sooo much better! I am sure these will save my outdoor furniture for the future and I will buy these again. Buy these with no regrets cause they are great quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT AND LOOKS GREAT! ALSO BOUGHT THE Duck Covers DD3666 Duck Dome Airbag, 66" L x 36" W, White AND THE MATCHING FIRE PIT COVER. BOUGHT 79 INCH COVER FIRST IT DID NOT FIT.... MY SOFA DIMENSIONS ARE: 78.5"(L) x 32"(W) x 30.5"(H); E 82 INCH
customer_reviews.author: sknj69

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job but disappointing in the durability...
customer_reviews.text: So I like this cover. It protects my outdoor couch and seems like it keeps the water off pretty well. However, after 1 week of use, we were putting it on and my hubby was pulling down the corner and it ripped. Like, very easily. He was tanking on it or being to rough. He simply pulled the edge to go infer the foot of the couch and RIP! The section with the breathable mesh ripped right away from the heavier cloth. I’m disappointed in this. Besides this, I do like the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Grace M Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best cover I’ve bought but still need to bring in the cushions
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and I love them. I live in the south and during hurricane season, outdoor furniture needs protecting. These do a great job as long as you dry them out when it’s not rainy and let the furniture breath. Because they are more durable and thicker than the less sturdy covers, they also trap more moisture in. I’ve learned it’s safer just to bring the outdoor cushions inside when it’s going to rain for days
customer_reviews.author: Emily Doelger

customer_reviews.title: Began tearing after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again--the covers began to tear after a few months. I stored the items in the covers over the winter and in taking them back out, the covers are ripping as if they were tissue paper. If you buy these, expect to replace them annually. At the cost of the covers, it might be easier to go without and just replace the cushions of the items your covering. I was very disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: James A Preuss

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was NOT suppose to fade...we put it out less than 3 months ago and look how it has faded...we live in Illinois...not in a state with extreme HEAT I believe the description is FALSE...it needs to be reworded correctly! Very disappointed...I loved how it fit and how it looked until it faded...it is truly waterproofed and it appears durable BUT NOT RESISTANT to FADING FROM THE SUN!
customer_reviews.author: Susam

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few months now so I cant really speak of the reliability and durability of the product. But over all great. It goes on top of my mobile outdoor kitchen/ sink counter. I bought it over sized to be able to loop the clasp around the wheels at the base. We love it since its easy to take off and put back on. Color seems to be fine now, might have a different opinion next year after it has seen some texas sun.
customer_reviews.author: Prithwiraj Ghosh Roy

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous in every way!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of the Duck covers for my deck furniture, the style is classic, the material is excellent in every way and the price is very competitive. I've even gotten compliments from my neighbors that my "winterized" deck looks wonderful. I highly endorse this product and manufacturer. ~Ms Moretti's View
customer_reviews.author: MsMorettisView

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great. I have purchase other covers from Home Depot or Menards for twice the price that felt like plastic. This is softer and just as water resistant. While it does not have a vent towards the top the stripe along the bottom is a breathable material. If there was one thing I would change would be something larger indicating the front so it goes on quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Rzjcubs

customer_reviews.title: Very Waterproof, but Fade and Rot
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these 3 years ago for use on my deck in the Pacific NW. Very waterproof, furniture never got wet and indeed water would pool on the cover after a rain. Excellent. Even though this is not a real sunny climate, the covers quickly faded. And they were inside during the winter months. This year they essentially rotted out, fabric would tear whenever cover was gently moved. An excellent product for the first year, but into the trash after 3 years. Unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cover I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I've had MANY patience covers and the fit and material of this one ranks as the best. It is heavy duty but flexible enough to fit around the furniture. I'd say it is a little bigger then the measurements say as I was able to get the love seat and a small end table, on each end, all under the cover and secured........Which is exactly what I was hoping for. I am going two buy two more for my chaise lounges next. The price for this was 50% cheaper then the last one I bought so I will definitely be sticking with this brand and company. Hopefully it lasts many years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Only time will tell
customer_reviews.text: The Duck Covers fit our outdoor furniture perfectly. But we have not had these 2 months and I can already see fading. My bigger concern is protection of what's underneath. I'll tolerate fading, if it's protecting the furniture. Future review will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cover up!
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and designed to fit our out door furniture perfectly. The tie down clamps will secure the cover from the winds that are often quite strong. What’s more our cat Logan loves it as provides a secure shelter from the elements while he luxuriates on the couch beneath.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Cover developed SLITS going all the way through. NOT GOOD.
customer_reviews.text: Received June 2019. Product looked great. I like the clips to hold it to the furniture & and the cords you can tighten. Had it in the glider rest of summer through winter. Color hasn't faded. BUT, good thing I didn't leave the cushions on all winter. The fabric had TWO SLITS in it going all the way through so it LEAKED. I would've been awful if the cushions were on.
customer_reviews.author: nvr cook

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: Bought these covers just over 2 years ago, so just out of warranty by a few months. They faded within the first year, but that did not really bother me since they did a good job of keeping my furniture dry. Then this year they seem to have dry rotted and tore easily when putting back on. Looking at other reviews, I am not the only person to experience this issue. The price is good, but it seems that you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stoudt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of this brand for our steel fire pit last year. Has held up well and has handled the Michigan winter with a problem. So we bought 5 more for our outdoor furniture when the cheap vinyl ones we had fell apart. These covers are nice and large and easily fit our furniture. The old ones barely fit. These are the best covers I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: B. P. Hughey

customer_reviews.title: Patio Sofa Cover
customer_reviews.text: What a huge improvement over the cover that came with the chair. Very well made and durable. Love the velcro strap adjustments so the loose material doesn't flap in the wind. The colors even match the house. For the price, we are very happy with these covers.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Covers
customer_reviews.text: We bought several of these covers for our new outdoor furniture. In early 2018. The covers did ok until the rain came. California had a very rainy season and after the season ended in March 2019. We removed the covers and found horrible black mold completely covering the entire inside of the covers. Additionally, the umbrella cover split at the top. They are nice for sunny weather but I would not buy again. We also called Duck Covers and they were little to no assistance and told me to wash them.
customer_reviews.author: shaunoxster

customer_reviews.title: Look good and keeps cushions dry.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these for my outdoor couch and only used them for a few very rainy months so far. The covers kept the cushions completely dry. They also look very nice with easy to use straps to secure them to the legs of the couch. I hope they survive the long winters here.
customer_reviews.author: closet

customer_reviews.title: This is my second time to purchase a Duck Cover
customer_reviews.text: These covers look nice and seem well made. This is my second time to purchase a Duck Cover. The first purchase was for our love seat. We liked it so much, once the old sofa cover started "dusting" our furniture we decided to buy the Duck Cover again for the sofa. These covers have leg tie downs in case you have high winds. Fits really well too. We had the first one for about 6 months and no signs of wear or sun damage yet. We live in central Texas so the sun is an issue especially with these covers that are on the west side of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal F

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, for a while...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great cover initially - bought it in November 2010. Definitely hasn't faded but all of a sudden i found a tear in it - not in a seam or a place that might make sense but now it's useless because water will get right thru . Hoping the company sees this review and contacts me to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Super quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of this cover. We bought it for two outdoor recliners with a small wedge table between them which made them a bit curved. It worked even better than we imagined and we’re thrilled with the quality and the easy on off. We loop the straps under each foot and just take off the front loops and pull it up over the back of the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Jrdunn

customer_reviews.title: Covering Vintage outdoor wrought Iron Furniture
customer_reviews.text: Not a custom fit so it's a little long for my furniture but I am extremely happy with it. As far as durability is concerned it's too early to really tell how our Florida sun will affect it, thus the 4 stars. I will say it seems to be very well made, plus it's vented. We have had some torrential rain lately and our new cushions are staying dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The are the Best Patio Covers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a middle of the road upgrade for my last covers. NOT MIDDLE OF THE ROAD, MUCH BETTER! I was surprised at the quality. It's been six months in the Georgia rain and heat, they are still perfect. No discoloration, or shrinkage. Buy these before they raise the price!
customer_reviews.author: JLP

customer_reviews.title: Nice covers
customer_reviews.text: These are great covers. They fit perfect. We are using them on a open covered porch so I won't know how well they would be in inclement weather. Being that they are a heavy canvas I would think they would be fine. 100% Recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: The best covers I’ve ever purchased for NE weather!
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor couch cover is amazing quality! So worth the price! I bought two more chair covers for the outdoor oversized wicker set we have. We’ve already had some snow and freezing rain here in NE, and my furniture is safe and secure under these amazing duck covers!!
customer_reviews.author: Cooley Family

customer_reviews.title: All weather protection
customer_reviews.text: Finally left all my patio furniture on the deck and just threw these covers on. Kept everything protected from lots of rain, bit of snow, mulberry droppings and bird doo-doo, able to just hose down, pack away for summer. Should have had these years ago rather than schlepping all my furniture down below the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. I can’t speak on its water resistance in direct weather. I use it to cover my outdoor couch from dust and rain that might come into my screened in patio. Description says it supposed to be 3-4 inches longer than my couch. It won’t come all the way down In a fitted position. It does what it needs to though.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Westenhiser

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and keeps out rain
customer_reviews.text: We buy these covers periodically because the sun tends to dry out the material eventually. We have bought this brand before, knowing that this holds up well and longer than other brands under sun and rain. Material feels thicker and reinforced rather than thin and flimsy. Allows breathability so trapped moisture beneath the covers do not end up causing moisture issues underneath. We buy this brand again and again.
customer_reviews.author: skysmom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Waited to rate these until we made it through a New York winter. They worked great! VERY durable. Completely water resistant. A little pricey but well worth it. I just purchased new patio furniture last summer and really need sturdy covers to get through the winter months and to extend the life of the patio furniture. I have no doubt that these covers will last for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: So far this has worked great for my outdoor couch. Doesn’t come down all the way in the back, but not a huge deal at all, covers the cushion part very nicely. I like the straps to hold it to the legs so it doesn’t fly off if it gets windy.
customer_reviews.author: Margalit Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Very durable cover!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover for my uncovered deck sofa to protect the cushions from the rain. I also hoped that it wood be roomy enough that I could store the multiple chair cushions under it as well on the sofa. I ordered size by measuring my sofa and it fit perfect with enough room for the other cushions. It appears very durable and has proven to be water proof. I live in a windy area and love the buckles that will keep it secure. It is everything I wanted at a great price
customer_reviews.author: dt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last past 2 years, don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is NOT durable. I just left it out covering my patio furniture and it faded and ripped after thr 2 year warranty was over. I bought 3 in different sizes and they ALL faded and ripped. See my pic. Should have gone with something else. What a waste of money. That's probably why the warranty is 2 years because it falls apart after.
customer_reviews.author: ramazon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a new patio furniture & wanted to protect it for winter. This fit perfectly on the sofa & is protecting it well. Our first year for it. Should last many more winters.
customer_reviews.author: Ashok

customer_reviews.title: Also for pontoons!!
customer_reviews.text: I used them to cover pontoon seats while the pontoon is tied to the dock. Keeps them dry and keeps the sun from damaging seats. Only used 1 season so far but they seem to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Duhuh

customer_reviews.title: Good covers for the money...
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed cover for our new deck furniture. It fits well and the straps and snaps do a good job of keeping it in place. We also bought the matching ones for the chairs and are equally happy with those. They have faded pretty quickly, but they get the full blast of the sun for a large portion of the day on the exposed deck. When I see the fading I'm very happy the cover is getting the beating and not the furniture. No rips or holes after a full summer in Chicago with plenty of wind and rain. I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ranman

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy quality product
customer_reviews.text: I had looked locally at some covers for our new conversation set on our patio but was not impressed. These covers are the deal. Heavy canvas, nice adjustable straps and they seem to repel water just fine. You won't be sorry, they are not cheap covers.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Fades
customer_reviews.text: After less than a month the color faded from brown to cream...in the areas the sun hits. This was in May, not even hot yet. It still appears to be waterproof so not sure if its just color or if the material is deteriorating. May be ok if you live without sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful. Will stain your furniture and your skin red.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the liner will instantly stain your furniture and your hands. Had this product for less than 10 minutes. Put it on our furniture and any part of the furniture that the cover touched was instantly covered in this red/pink paint. I had to try to salvage my cushions. The sponge was able to get most of the red color off. My hands turned pink as well, which is how even our door handle turned pink. It took several washings to get off my skin. Awful product.
customer_reviews.author: thisguy

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them
customer_reviews.text: My sofas measured out to be exactly 87" long so I was afraid this cover would be too short. Luckily, they were a few inches longer than stated so they were perfect. I didn't have to worry about height because my sofas sit low. So far it has kept my sofas dry even after a massive rain storm so I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: Great furniture cover for a great price. I use this to cover two chairs and a small table. Looks nice, wicks moisture. This is my second one. The first one held up to the harsh Colorado sun for 3-4 years. I'm happy to purchase another one to replace it and keep that harsh sun off my patio furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Quality Company!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 covers for my patio furniture about a year ago. The covers really work well and have protected my furniture perfectly. Very heavy material and the construction of the cover are impressive. The only complaint I had was that the covers faded pretty significantly within the year, although their website claims that they would not fade. The good news, is that I took some pictures, and sent the company an email about the fading issue, they responded immediately and sent me new covers with no questions asked. My new covers arrived today. I couldn't be happier with this company standing behind their product!
customer_reviews.author: Schnelkc

customer_reviews.title: Not good to cover metal furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cover that feels like good quality material. Came exactly how it was described. I bought this to cover my metal glider bench. It sits on my porch and gets a lot of afternoon sun. The problem is that the metal gets hot and the covers waterproof lining actually melts onto the metal. It peels off from the cover and sticks to the metal. I can peel the left over from the metal but now the cover has strips of this lining missing and left some residue on the glider. I saw other reviews about it being ok in the sun but this was not ok on metal.
customer_reviews.author: B D

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this product after using it in the rain. The water beaded up and rolled right off. Edit: On Monday of this week we had a derecho in Chicago. This baby stayed put and wasn't even tied down with the clips.
customer_reviews.author: Chitownwhitney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This cover was better then i expected. I live in a beach city so the sun is always shining on this cover. it hasn’t faded at all. During the raining season its kept my patio furniture dry as well.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Q

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed to cover our outdoor furniture and keep it dry. We've had the wettest summer but with this our furniture stays dry. The vents keep the humidity from building up underneath the cover as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Smith

customer_reviews.title: These are great furniture covers!
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely high quality cover. It is heavy duty and looks great. The cover is conveniently marked with a tag inside on the front, so it's easier to find the front & rear when you're putting the cover on. The cover repels water and also has straps to go around the legs/feet if it's very windy. We ended up purchasing 2 of these 79" covers to use on our patio sectional. For the price, I can't see how there is a better cover.
customer_reviews.author: RemoGaggi

customer_reviews.title: Holding Up OK
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for two months. It fits our outdoor couch very well and has done a great job at keeping it dry through many rain showers; however, the top is fading quite a bit already. it makes me wonder how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Will not last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought multiple of these for different types of patio furniture in June 2017. Looked & worked great while they lasted. Started fading within couple of months. One of them tore in less than a year & slowly all of them are falling apart from multiple places. Will need to replace all now - June 2019. It starts with a wrinkle like line in the outer surface & before you know it they end up with multiple large slits all over.
customer_reviews.author: D. Arora

customer_reviews.title: That they work great and look nice
customer_reviews.text: I love all these products. They didn't have one small enough for my 2 seat glider. So I got the smallest one for a love seat and put my stacking tables on the end of the glider. 2 items covers from the weather!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brigette Hare

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, really thick and durable. Dimensions were exact and fit my furniture perfectly. They have great straps on the side so you can tighten it as needed towards the bottom so there is no drag. No snow in SoCal but it worked protecting on some crazy winds as well as from ash on a recent fire.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This cover will definitely protect your furniture with unwavering dignity! It sounds bizarre, yes but when you feel the material you will understand that your seat, ottoman, or sofa will be protected from rain and cat poop.
customer_reviews.author: Jëpá

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Fits my outdoor pool deck chair very nicely. The quality is great and I think it will last a very long time. It’s perfect for keeping the sun and rain off the chair to keep it preserved longer. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Brewington

customer_reviews.title: Fits well!
customer_reviews.text: Cover fits great. We have an l shape couch, which is basically a love seat with two ottomans, one extending the couch into an l shape. We stacked the ottomans on the couch and covered with this cover and it all works perfectly so far. The material is very nice and the color is pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Casberry

customer_reviews.title: Finally.  Covers that can take the rough ocean climate.
customer_reviews.text: So I live 2 blocks from the ocean. For years I have tried to find patio covers that do not disintegrate from sun and ocean air. Most covers last maybe 3-6 max. So far these seem brand new and I have had the. For 6 months. Simply the best
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Good for one year.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these covers for my patio furniture and grill cover. For the first year they are there great. Second year not so much, they tear. There cheap, fit well, but I have to think there are better products out there. For the money they are not bad.
customer_reviews.author: E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, color
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty loveseat cover, far better quality than the over-the-counters you can get at Walmart and even some I've purchased at Lowe's. Have a smaller loveseat (approx. 48"L x 34"H x 30"D) so have room to spare, can possibly use as gauge for if it'll fit yours way you want it to. I'd definitely recommend it, was very reasonable price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom's perspective

customer_reviews.title: Fits our futon perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We use this for a wood frame futon that we keep in our screen/glass porch. The fabric seems very sturdy and it fits perfectly. I measured twice before ordering. What little rain gets on the cover, beads up well. It does not soak into the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Prime customer

customer_reviews.title: The nicest cover I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these covers. They are lightweight, fitted, equipped with straps and tighteners and are very easy for one person to use and remove. The fabric makes them very easy to fold and store and they fit very well. I’ve recommended them to others. The best covers I’ve found in several years!
customer_reviews.author: T. Ericson

customer_reviews.title: Best patio furniture covers ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing quality and features in patio furniture covers that I have ever owned in my 75 years of life. The covers are very well fabricated out of heavy material and have "fitting points" well made and reinforced. The hold down straps that clip oared the legs make them stay put on my patios facing two miles of open water and "so far" 25 MPH winds... Time will tell how well they hold up in the sun and heat on Hilton Head Island!
customer_reviews.author: DocHarrisHHI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coverage
customer_reviews.text: We use this to cover our two outdoor rockers in the winter. Put it over both, pull them apart to keep it taut, with room in between for a table or two. Excellent, durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S.

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking and very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and they look great. I immediately purchased the chair covers after receiving this because I was very impressed. I have to cover my furniture nearly everyday as my deck is covered by a huge white pine that drops needles, sap and debris constantly during the different seasons.. I've ordered from other companies and the covers never fit properly and looked awful and had to be replaced every 2-3 years. We have had several heavy thunderstorms recently and these held up beautifully. I will update next summer and report how they withstood during the fall and winter months.BTW...We love in northern NJ.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Meehan, W. Caldwell, NJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cover.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is awesome. Great quality, looks great. I was really impressed when I opened this cover. Very good quality and reasonably priced! Would definitely recommend. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: pearl1974

customer_reviews.title: Nicely fit and very durable
customer_reviews.text: I love the couch cover and it arrived sooner than expected. I also ordered 2 of their chair covers but I'm REALLY DISAPPOINTED that it is taking a lot longer than they said but I still can't wait till they come in.
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: After doing much research for chair covers I decided on the duck covers. I love everything about them...good quality, well made, waterproof, good fit. I would recommend you spend the extra money on good quality products
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a sofa cover for weeks now. All the big box stores had something but not this big. It fits perfectly, been through a few storms and stayed in place and the material is pretty sturdy! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bench covers
customer_reviews.text: Used to cover benches in gazebo. It is s a little large for our need but smaller size would not be large enough. Product looks great and I appreciate the loops to latch to legs so it won't blow away.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LOOKING DURABLE AND VERY FUNCTIONAL
customer_reviews.text: I bought a total of 4 covers the sofa, chairs and a table cover. These are excellent covers I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the material and the straps. You cannot go wrong in purchasing these products.
customer_reviews.author: JJ SML Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Watertight, fitted, secure and effective.
customer_reviews.text: super happy I splurged for this cover for the full size couch we keep on the roof deck. We had a big rain and wind storm last weekend and it did a great job protecting the couch. Stayed in place and kept it dry, even with an inch of standing water accumulated! I also like that it's shaped/fitted well enough that you can sit on the cover, in a pinch. so I don't have to uncover it just to let the l the dog hop up for a quick nap.
customer_reviews.author: A. Grangaard

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are off, cinches don't cinch much.
customer_reviews.text: This was the closest in size to what our furniture is but our loveseat was swimming in the cover. Since the cinches don't cinch much I couldn't get the excess material up off the ground. Returned. No other size options look like they will work. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Stretch

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Attractive. Waterproof!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my retro metal glider. We live in Central Ohio and have been getting more than average rainfall. (Five inches in five days this week alone). This cover has exceeded expectations. It looks nice and keeps everything including cushions dry. I would recommend without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: AHB

customer_reviews.title: Tore after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be perfect....expecting a year of use. Nope...lasted 1 month and already ripped. Not at a seam but just a random place. I'm using it thru pollen season and then it goes in the garbage. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D.

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: These covers are heavy duty and include buckles for each leg of the piece of furniture. I'm disappointed in the posted measurements. I have an 88 inch long sofa and ordered the 96 inch cover per the instructions but it is way too big. The 88 inch size would have looked more tailored and less sloppy. Not worth returning and reordering the proper size ...
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cover two swivel chairs and a coffee table. It is exactly what I expected. Seems very durable, and it does a good job repelling the rain. Fingers crossed it holds-up over a snowy, icy winter. Update: i have had this cover a little less than 2-years. I discovered an 18 inch strip that was starting to disintegrate, and realized I was still within the 2-year warranty. I emailed Duck Covers a photo, and within minutes they replied that they were sending me a replacement. I stand by the 5-stars knowing they stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible low maintenance material
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY a couch cover my dogs can't destroy! Love this canvas material as it protects my cushions from dogs that like to twist, turn, and jump on the couch to find their most comfortable position. And on rainy days, wet muddy feet are not a problem as it vacuums right off after it dries.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Duck Covers
customer_reviews.text: The Duck Covers I bought to use on my outdoor furniture. They are excellent and made from tough material. They keep the water out and protect the furniture. Excellent product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Osborne Penn

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof covers!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought them, (I accidentally tore my other one)they are great. We use it to cover our furniture at our cabin, so they are exposed to all temps including snow. They fit perfect and the straps to secure prevent the wind from carrying them away. Over the last 3 years they have faded, but still work great.
customer_reviews.author: kellie

customer_reviews.title: Iffy
customer_reviews.text: This covered does or i should say did keep the weather and water off or patio furniture, but developed a tear after a year which we dealt with but now two years in we have to replace. The chair covers are still in good condition but the sofa cover didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great. It has been subjected to several Severe Storms lately. The cover has held up very well. High quality, durable and looks good to the eye. Great product. Will be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Shesko

customer_reviews.title: Protect valuable furniture
customer_reviews.text: I have very nice outdoor furniture that would never make it without appropriate covers. I have purchased Duck covers for years, and they are waterproof, durable, and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wright

customer_reviews.title: Top quality covers.
customer_reviews.text: While this did not work out for my application - I wanted to review them as top quality - as they are very, very nice covers. I knew I was taking a shot with my furniture as the dimensions were VERY close and I was hoping it would fit anyway - but it did not. I can say though - these covers are very nice quality. I just wish they had an option to fit mine curved sections.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mulek

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof but they do fade.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have 2” thick padding on my furniture underneath and I also live in Indiana and it rains buckets here. They have never been wet or even damp after days of rain. Sometimes it looks like the covers are soaked through, but they aren’t. Also, they will fade in the direct sunlight. Some of my pics show the difference between 2 chairs (1 in the sun and the other isn’t).
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Saewert

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome so far
customer_reviews.text: We've had nothing but wind, rain and snow since I received these covers a month ago. They are awesome so far. We had rain which pooled 2-3" deep in part of the cover. I meant to go out and shake it off but forgot and it stayed there overnight. It did not leak! The other day we had 50 mph wind gust and these things stayed in place. We bought the sofa cover and two chair covers. Seeing how well these held up we are going to purchase a fire pit cover and table and chair cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great covers
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Heavy material (much heavier than I expected) and well made. We have had this cover on our outdoor furniture for over a year. The covers stay on and keep our cushions dry in any weather up to and including a small hurricane (no kidding). The brown does fade a little in the hot South Carolina sun but no big deal. Straps with plastic clips at each corner do a good job holding the cover on but we usually don't use them. Once you figure it out, they fold easily for storage. I highly recommend these covers if you want to protect your outdoor furniture. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick A. Olney

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well-made outdoor furniture cover!
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely well made, nice looking outdoor furniture cover! It’s heavy duty and so easy to put on. It fit perfectly. Be sure to measure your furniture and order the correct size. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Hoff

customer_reviews.title: There are pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Protects my furniture against high winds and rain. The straps that clip around the legs are fantastic. Unfortunately, in the Las Vegas sun, I had to replace them after 1 1/2 years due to sun rot.
customer_reviews.author: Nola Wyrick

customer_reviews.title: Fades quickly
customer_reviews.text: I had this product outside for less then 4 months in Seattle, which is not known for its crazy amount of sun. When I reached out to the company asking for help they said it was not covered. The cover looks terrible and cannot be used. I would not recommend if the aesthetics of these covers are important to you.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best covers ever!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give them a 10, I would!! The material is fantastic. Easy to work with and extremely weather proof. Fun to watch the rain just run off when the furniture is covered. Easy to fold when not in use because the material is so pliable. Just great stuff!! I recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: These do not last
customer_reviews.text: I live in Colorado and these get quite a bit of sunlight and they do not last. They faded within a few months and within the first year covers on all of my furniture had faded, dry rotted and started ripping. We did use the warranty, but you have to send in pictures and everything; in the end they were replace, but the replacements have rotted as well. So, we duct taped them up to try to make the last a couple of years, but for Colorado's sun, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie R. Dearman

customer_reviews.title: Great covers and excellent price, easy to put on!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best furniture covers I have bought to date. It's my 3rd set. I loved them so much and the price is incredible.I went right back and bought another set so when these burn out I have replacements. What I really love about them also is the latches that go around the legs. My previous covers had eyelets and a shoe string which was easy enough, but these have Velcro. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from these considering the price is pretty low but they are REALLY good. Fit extremely well, easy to put on, maintain their shape, excellent quality, and they look stylish. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: RebaD

customer_reviews.title: seems good so far
customer_reviews.text: This is for a rental home, so I can update wear and tear later. It seems well made and was happy the color was a med. brown. It didn't seem to protect from the ocean morning mist, but it might do well with rain.
customer_reviews.author: bluiis1

product_meta.title: Duck Covers Ultimate Waterproof 79 Inch Patio Sofa Cover
product_meta.description: Size:79W x 37D x 35H| Style:Cover OnlyIdeal for use in harsh weather and high wind conditions. Duck Covers Ultimate Series patio furniture covers are designed to protect patio furniture from dust, dirt, sun, rain and heavy snow. Manufactured using a combination of high-strength polyester top panel, plus innovative, multi-layer, breathable side panels to help eliminate condensation. The multi-layer, breathable side panels eliminates the need for vents and provides additional cover height, unlike shorter competitive covers which offer less protection. High-strength polyester base for added durability. Mocha Cappuccino color. Two-year limited warranty has you covered. Migrate to Duck Covers today.
feature_bullets: Patio covers: Fits patio sofas 79 inches W x 37 inches D x 35 inches H
Waterproof fabric is ideal for high moisture climates
Seam sealer tape applied during manufacturing process prevents water penetrating the cover at the seams
UV stability added during material production to reduce fading
A combination of nylon straps with side-release buckles and shock cord with locks firmly secures cover in place
Color coordinated so patio furniture covers can be combined with Duck Covers Elite or Essential Series
Duck Covers recommend you store cushions separately when not in use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,855 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
